name: Pablo Pidoggo
description:
WASD to move, left mouse to bark, space to jump

You play the role of Pablo Pidoggo, a magical dog with the power of color on his side. The local meat packing plant has caused the entire world to go bleak, including the 4 sages. You must find the 4 sages and convert them back from monsters. 

This game was made for the pre-made assets jam. All textures were provided
